text: læa brrda phu thima hlangcak phwk khea doy phwk khea klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng rea thrng pord xphay hı kæ rea læa phinxng khxng rea phu sung di sraththa kxn hna rea læa khx phraxngkh xya di hı mi kar kheiydkhæn keid khun nı hawcı khxng rea tx brrda phu sraththa kha tæ phracea khxng rea thæcring phraxngkh than pen phuthrng xendu phuthrng metta semx
